mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_WORK_EXPERIENCE_INFO(USER_ID, WORK_SEQ, WORK_PLACE, WORK_START_DATE, WORK_END_DATE, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, CREATOR, MODIFIER) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{work_seq}, #{work_place}, #{work_start_date}, #{work_end_date}, now(), now(), #{user_id}, #{user_id} )

INSERT INTO TB_WORK_EXPERIENCE_INFO_HIST(user_id, work_seq, hist_seq, work_place, work_start_date, work_end_date, created_date, creator) SELECT USER_ID, WORK_SEQ, #{hist_seq}, WORK_PLACE, WORK_START_DATE, WORK_END_DATE, now(), #{user_id} FROM TB_WORK_EXPERIENCE_INFO WHERE WORK_SEQ = #{work_seq} AND USER_ID = #{user_id}
